name: The Temple of Torment
description:
Updated on 26th of May 2018 to Stable 17.3
The Temple of Torment is a classic roguelike set on a renaissance world invaded by the hordes of Hell.
Official website
Subreddit
It has all the real roguelike features:
Turn-basedASCII and TilesGrid-basedPermadeath (can be toggled off too)
The game currently features
Sword & sorcery & firearms!15 classes!Over 30 quests!Static overworld!Over 30 world map locations!Over 60 levels large procedural main dungeon!Over 100 items!Over 100 monsters!Mouse support!
